improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error.  The variable 'x' will be -9 after the loop.  The program should check that x is not zero before performing the division.
Unreachable code. The condition x > 0 will always be false after the first iteration of the loop (x will become 9, then 8...until it is -9). Therefore y = 0 will never be executed.
Add a check to prevent division by zero by validating the value of x before performing the division.
